ygData.subject: Re: Stein Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Sorry for the double post.  Just a quick warning in case you try to do what I did.  I forgot to mention that the web page doesn t mention that 2 of the
ygData.messageBody:
Sorry for the double post. Just a quick warning in case you try to do what I
did. I forgot to mention that the web page doesn't mention that 2 of the
components (the Koalindl fish and the Eruds Tonic) required to complete the
first half of the quest (make the bartenders compendum) are no drop, as is
the compendum. I tried to have some friends come along the first time around
figuring I could do the last part in ogguk for them, but it didn't work that
way much to my friends dismay. :(

Ez



Jenni wrote:

> From: Jenni <freya@...>
>
> Alakhazam's website has a great set of instructions for this quest. I've
> done the quest twice using this page. The info is very complete.
>
> go to http://everquest.gamestats.com/
> it's under the quest link, then Ogguk quests. The title of the quest on
> this page is exotic drinks.
>
> Ezrae
> Dark Elf Enchantress of the 12th Season
> Brell Serilis
>
